Posts.EditableText: I want the players to be able to input "put (object) on (a surface like tables)" and the object they're referring to will be moved to that surface. Any solutions?
Posts.HTML: I want the players to be able to input "put (object) on (a surface like tables)" and the object they're referring to will be moved to that surface. Any solutions?

Posts.EditableText: That's a built-in feature of Quest. You just need to change the table's container type (on the 'container' tab) to "surface", so Quest knows things can be put on it.
Posts.HTML: That's a built-in feature of Quest. You just need to change the table's container type (on the 'container' tab) to "surface", so Quest knows things can be put on it.
